products.title: Rainforest Rainbow Roman Blind
products.description: Colour is the hallmark of clarissa hulse's work and it doesn't get much more colourful than this vibrant rainforest rainbow roman blind design. Inspired by costa rican cloud forests the tropical ferns are picked out in a multititude of bright hues. This blind will make a spectacu colour is the hallmark of clarissa hulse's work and it doesn't get much more colourful than this vibrant rainforest rainbow roman blind design.

products.title: Dill Teal Roman Blind
products.description: What says summer better than beautiful flowering botanicals. Dill is the plant of choice in this stunning clarissa hulse design. The silhouettes are burnt out onto a gorgeous teal blue ombre. The modern, vibrant flavour of this roman blind is certain to add a pop of colour to you what says summer better than beautiful flowering botanicals.

products.title: Dill Pebble Roman Blind
products.description: This dill pebble roman blind design from clarissa hulse extracts all that is beautiful about nature and the british countryside. The firework blossoms of the flowering dill plant are silhoutted against a gorgeous pebble tone graduating up the fabric. Ideal for creating a warm and this dill pebble roman blind design from clarissa hulse extracts all that is beautiful about nature and the british countryside.

products.title: Ombre Sunset Roman Blind
products.description: What a way to capture those glorious sunsets you only get to see on postcards. This clarissa hulse ombre roman blind will bring stunning colour to your life. The rich shades of orange, crimson and purple start out light and increase in vibrancy as they cascade down this blind. Pr what a way to capture those glorious sunsets you only get to see on postcards.

products.title: Ombre Blush Roman Blind
products.description: Clarissa hulse uses colour so well and this ombre roman blind is the perfect example. Moving from delicate light pink into a much richer blush tone as you follow it down the fabric it looks stylish and incredible modern. Taking clarissa's signature design we've added the blinds 2 clarissa hulse uses colour so well and this ombre roman blind is the perfect example.

products.title: Ombre Midnight Roman Blind
products.description: Ombre is clarissa hulse's signature style, she's been using it for 20 years now so it's about as close to perfection as you can get. The combination of blue and navy hues cascade from light to dark down the fabric in a graduated pattern. Perfect for adding a modern splash of colo ombre is clarissa hulse's signature style, she's been using it for 20 years now so it's about as close to perfection as you can get.

products.title: Ombre Fuchsia Roman Blind
products.description: A clarissa hulse classic, this ombre fuchsia roman blind is simple yet incredibly effective. The colour cascades down the fabric, starting light and increasing in vibrancy as it makes its way down. It's the most stylish way imaginable to add some real personality to your home. O a clarissa hulse classic, this ombre fuchsia roman blind is simple yet incredibly effective.

products.title: Blowing Grasses Blue Roman Blind
products.description: Each clarissa hulse design comes with a personal story and this one is inspired by blustery walks in the greek and british countrysides. The result is an elegant, feathery print of swaying grasses that will add beauty and charm to your home. This blind is picked out in contrastin each clarissa hulse design comes with a personal story and this one is inspired by blustery walks in the greek and british countrysides.

products.title: Ombre Ochre Roman Blind
products.description: It's clarissa hulse's signature style and boy do we love it. This ombre roman blind design starts out light at the top and cascades down the fabric, increasing in vibrancy as it goes. The ochre tone is incredibly popular and offers a warm and interesting pop of colour to neutral it's clarissa hulse's signature style and boy do we love it.

products.title: Blowing Grasses Pebble Roman Blind
products.description: Inspired by blustery walks through the english countryside, this clarissa hulse blowing grasses design is an elegant neutral design that will fill your home with modern rustic charm. The feathery grasses were collected by clarissa herself for a personal touch and printed in a lo inspired by blustery walks through the english countryside, this clarissa hulse blowing grasses design is an elegant neutral design that will fill your home with modern rustic charm.

products.title: Kazuyo Border Faux Silk Blush Roman Blind
products.description: Soft pink, elegant faux silk and a border pattern of fluttering butterflies. This kazuyo border roman blind, designed by harlequin, is as prestigious and luxurious as they come. A border design makes it easy to add some pattern to your home without dominating the rest of the spac soft pink, elegant faux silk and a border pattern of fluttering butterflies.

products.title: Salice Mustard Roman Blind
products.description: Chintzy, delicate and with an organic twist, the salice mustard roman blind is a scene of pure delight. In situ amongst country styled dcor, itll bring the charm, sweeping in like a breath of fresh air. The natural colourway of the blind makes it versatile indeed. Team with chintzy, delicate and with an organic twist, the salice mustard roman blind is a scene of pure delight.

products.title: Salice Tangerine Roman Blind
products.description: Extending the backdrop of the salice tangerine roman blind around the room, you can create a luxurious lounge of comfort and tranquility within a neutral lounge with ease. The fresh pops of orange add a fragrant touch to the blind, whilst the soft brown stems help to relax th extending the backdrop of the salice tangerine roman blind around the room, you can create a luxurious lounge of comfort and tranquility within a neutral lounge with ease.

products.title: Demoiselle Faux Silk Steel Roman Blind
products.description: With exquisitely detailed dragonflies upon a bed of shimmering silvered faux silk, this demoiselle faux silk steel roman blind fills your home with luxury and incredible style. When it comes to creating a visually strong pattern, harlequin certainly know how to make it happen, a with exquisitely detailed dragonflies upon a bed of shimmering silvered faux silk, this demoiselle faux silk steel roman blind fills your home with luxury and incredible style.

products.title: Sumi Chalk Roman Blind
products.description: Giving your windows impact doesn't always have to be bold and brash. In fact, this sumi chalk roman blind is pretty bold in its geometric pattern that it doesn't need colour to back it up. It stands on its own with the soft neutral shades, as well as making it a versatile choice giving your windows impact doesn't always have to be bold and brash.

products.title: Demoiselle Stone Roman Blind
products.description: This demoiselle stone roman blind is a hallmark harlequin design. It's sophisticated and stylish and is a perfect way to bring a bit of elegance into your home. The detailed sketching harks back to a bygone era while the fabric and the stone coloured background bring everything i this demoiselle stone roman blind is a hallmark harlequin design.

products.title: Formation Moonlight Roman Blind
products.description: Inspired by the contour lines of a map, this formation moonlight roman blind has a strong geometric presence, with incredible colour and styling. Upon the darkest of inly blue shades, the lines are a soft golden hue, contrasting beautifully to deliver pattern and passion throug inspired by the contour lines of a map, this formation moonlight roman blind has a strong geometric presence, with incredible colour and styling.

products.title: Demoiselle Ochre Roman Blind
products.description: Glowing bright with its sunshine yellow hue, the demoiselle ochre roman blind takes a bold and vibrant fabric and adds a generous helping of harlequin chic. Elegant damselflies rest in perfect formation, the bright whiteness of their delicate wings shining out from the fabric glowing bright with its sunshine yellow hue, the demoiselle ochre roman blind takes a bold and vibrant fabric and adds a generous helping of harlequin chic.

products.title: Demoiselle Mist Roman Blind
products.description: Giant dragonflies lend their grace and poise to this cool blue demoiselle roman blind, seeming to fly big and bold in tight formation across an icy sky. Its a cooling look, bringing calm and class to a space that needs a modern edge, a stunning example of harlequin style.

products.title: Zeal Ochre Roman Blind
products.description: Harlequin are known for their bold, fashion forward designs, and this zeal ochre roman blind is certainly no exception. Mixed with their fresh, yet remarkably soft colour palette, this collaborative design is sure to make quite the impact in your home, but in the calmest of ways.

products.title: Demoiselle Jute Roman Blind
products.description: This demoiselle pattern is fast becoming a staple in the harlequin style catalogue, bold and beautiful with incredibly detailed insects. We're so glad to have it in their harlequin additions collection. Not only is it full of designer style, it brings a wonderful natural touch int this demoiselle pattern is fast becoming a staple in the harlequin style catalogue, bold and beautiful with incredibly detailed insects.

products.title: Sumi Steel Roman Blind
products.description: Striking lines, brush strokes and soft colour palette, this sumi steel roman blind fuses a strong pattern with pared back tones, creating a look that's wonderfully balanced. Did you know it's part of their harlequin additions collection too? Not only is it oozing with designer sty striking lines, brush strokes and soft colour palette, this sumi steel roman blind fuses a strong pattern with pared back tones, creating a look that's wonderfully balanced.

products.title: Bali Indigo Roman Blind
products.description: Harlequin are world renowned for their expertise in making stripes stylish, sophisticated and elegant. This bali indigo roman blind is certainly no exception, in fact it only enhances their reputation. The variation in stripes creates an interesting look but without the harmon harlequin are world renowned for their expertise in making stripes stylish, sophisticated and elegant.

products.title: Bali Azure Roman Blind
products.description: Just like a warm summer's day, this bali azure roman blind is energetic, buzzing with colour and stylish flare. We simply adore the way that the bold fiery orange offsets the tonal blues, bringing warmth the a cool palette. Well done harlequin.

products.title: Trellis Lake Roman Blind
products.description: A stunningly simple and elegant pattern backed up by a simple two-colour palette. It all seems so simple but thats why harlequin are world-renowned, its all so simple for them. Great for bringing pattern into your home, this blind isnt whacky or funky, its just the right a stunningly simple and elegant pattern backed up by a simple two-colour palette.

products.title: Bahia Grape Roman Blind
products.description: Who said stripes were boring? This bahia grape roman blind isnt, thats for sure. Its not just the deconstructed stripes that give it a wavy quality, its also the beautiful gamut of colours. Vibrant shocks of pink cut through the more demure neutral tones of beige and grey, who said stripes were boring? This bahia grape roman blind isnt, thats for sure.

products.title: Bali Linden Roman Blind
products.description: Yellow and grey - its a match made in heaven and when you use this combo in a harlequin stripe, well theres not much that can go wrong really is there? The whole gamut of grey is there. Not quite 50 shades but everything from dark pewter to fluffy grey cloud. And to prevent yellow and grey - its a match made in heaven and when you use this combo in a harlequin stripe, well theres not much that can go wrong really is there? The whole gamut of grey is there.

products.title: Paradise Flamingo Roman Blind
products.description: Well, nothing comes quite as close to the paradise flamingo roman blind on the liveliness scale, does it? This window dressing is simply exotic. This blind is perfect for dressing a bright and breezy space, bringing a warming touch with the tropical leaves and exquisite colour well, nothing comes quite as close to the paradise flamingo roman blind on the liveliness scale, does it? This window dressing is simply exotic.

products.title: Paradise Raspberry Roman Blind
products.description: Were simply lost for words with this paradise raspberry roman blind. No description could ever do the punchy tones and tropical pattern justice. What we will say, though, is just how wonderful the designer of this design is. Harlequin are an absolute gem in the interiors worl were simply lost for words with this paradise raspberry roman blind.

products.title: Paradise Lagoon Roman Blind
products.description: Fresh, funky and forever feeling snazzy, this paradise lagoon roman blind is everything that the harlequin brand stands for. It brings the jungle theme in the coolest way possible. Theres an abundance of tones in this design, making the window dressing fantastically versatile fresh, funky and forever feeling snazzy, this paradise lagoon roman blind is everything that the harlequin brand stands for.

products.title: Limosa Magenta Roman Blind
products.description: The designers at harlequin have long been influenced by nature and its details, and this limosa magenta roman blind is no exception. It happens to be dressed in an exquisite palette too. And its this palette of blues, greens, purples and pinks that make the blind look absolu the designers at harlequin have long been influenced by nature and its details, and this limosa magenta roman blind is no exception.

products.title: Gardenia Olivia Roman Blind
products.description: Green is often one of those overlooked colours for the home, but we think this gardenia olive roman blind from their harlequin additions range might start to turn heads. Its simple design makes a wonderful statement thanks to its large scale, whilst the injection of green helps green is often one of those overlooked colours for the home, but we think this gardenia olive roman blind from their harlequin additions range might start to turn heads.

products.title: Gardenia Inky Blue Roman Blind
products.description: Bursting with calming tones, the gardenia inky blue roman blind features a lovely array of blue shades, with a touch of green to create a well-rounded display. One of harlequins most loved designs, weve given this gardenia pattern a freshening up for their harlequin additions bursting with calming tones, the gardenia inky blue roman blind features a lovely array of blue shades, with a touch of green to create a well-rounded display.

products.title: Floris Ashen White Roman Blind
products.description: With their designer ranges, we love to take never-before-as-a-fabric designs and turn them into an absolute masterpiece, just like we have with this harlequin additions floris pattern. Dug out of the archives and given a good softening up, not only is the ashen white roman blind with their designer ranges, we love to take never-before-as-a-fabric designs and turn them into an absolute masterpiece, just like we have with this harlequin additions floris pattern.

products.title: Bella Frost Roman Blind
products.description: Simple stripes have always been something of a staple for harlequin and we just love the way they combine colours to get the most out of this sophisticated design. Bella frost takes a cool blue palette and blends it with some soft greys to bring you a refined and highly cultur simple stripes have always been something of a staple for harlequin and we just love the way they combine colours to get the most out of this sophisticated design.

products.title: Silhouette Peacock Roman Blind
products.description: Harlequin describes their silhouette pattern as using unexpected colour combinations and we dont think we could have put it better. Teal is met by lime green and orange. And somehow, alongside the intricate styling of the trees, this colour combination works beautifully in harlequin describes their silhouette pattern as using unexpected colour combinations and we dont think we could have put it better.

products.title: Flavia Stone Roman Blind
products.description: Simple and sweet, this flavia stone roman blind takes an oversized, dramatic pattern and brings it down to earth with a multitude of neutral tones. This design plays home to modern greys, inky charcoal, stone grey and gorgeous sand, which when brought together creates a calmi simple and sweet, this flavia stone roman blind takes an oversized, dramatic pattern and brings it down to earth with a multitude of neutral tones.

products.title: Flavia Cerise Roman Blind
products.description: We simply adore this flavia cerise roman blind from the harlequin additions range, with its fusion of retro and contemporary vibes. The soft stone background offsets the rainbow of coloured shapes beautifully. And its this combination of pink, blue, green and mocha make the we simply adore this flavia cerise roman blind from the harlequin additions range, with its fusion of retro and contemporary vibes.

products.title: Flavia Wild Grape Roman Blind
products.description: Full of autumnal vibes, this flavia wild grape roman blind is the perfect way to bring some warmth into your home through naturally inspired patterns. Using tones such as damson and golden mustard, this harlequin additions design feels traditional, whilst having that modern a full of autumnal vibes, this flavia wild grape roman blind is the perfect way to bring some warmth into your home through naturally inspired patterns.

products.title: Toucan Talk, Tropical - Roman Blind
products.description: Featuring a lively, colourful, and charismatic array of toucans and parrots, the toucan talk tropical is nothing if not fun. The vibrant colour palette is indeed tropical, and the birds look like they could be in deep conversation. Whilst this fun and characterful blind would be ideal for a little one's bedroom or playroom, it's not exclusive to children. Adults will love the sweet illustrations too, so consider using it to breathe some life and vivacity into your kitchen or dining room.

products.title: Paradise, Fennel - Roman Blind
products.description: Featuring fennel green tones, alongside yellows and whites, this pretty offering from the paradise range is aptly named. The lush foliage and florals depicted are reminiscent of a country paradise, making this a work of art in its own right. Create a serene utopia for your guests to rest up in by using the fennel in your spare bedroom. Surround with similar greens, accenting occasionally with yellows and whites, and keep the general look and feel of the room tranquil and relaxing.

products.title: Paradise, Saxon Blue - Roman Blind
products.description: The naturally toned paradise in saxon blue offers gorgeous shades of green and blue on a soft white background. And, made from 100% cotton, its smooth fabric sits neatly in attractive roman folds, looking right at home wherever it's hung. Use the saxon blue to breathe colour into the living room, surrounding it with matching cool blues, as well as the occasional green to accent. Add plenty of fresh cotton and linen fabrics in the form of throws and cushions for extra cosiness.

products.title: Carlotta, Blossom - Roman Blind
products.description: An intricate weave of pretty florals and weaves, the carlotta in blossom features rich shades of pink alongside sunny yellows and leafy greens. The look is classic, yet contemporary enough that it would work in a variety of homes and dcor schemes. Use the blossom to bring your hallway or landing to life. This gorgeous roman blind can be your walkway's key feature, taking centre stage amidst similar pinks and rich creams.

products.title: Carlotta, Pebble - Roman Blind
products.description: The stylish light grey acts as the perfect canvas for the flourish of natural colours that make up carlotta pebble. The vibrancy of the pinks and reds is matched by the vitality of the greens and yellows to create a stunning visual that is a treat for your eyes. Dress the living room to impress with the inspired choice of carlotta pebble. Add in a matching lampshade and a set of scatter cushions to create a theme that welcomes you in without overpowering your senses.

products.title: Carlotta, Wisteria - Roman Blind
products.description: Looking pretty is what the carlotta wisteria does best, and these richly colourful blossoms are here to prove it. Lilacs, mauves, and blues are wonderfully offset by greens and yellows, forming an elaborate knot of florals that will add character to any home. Mix the wisteria with matching mauves in a bedroom or living room, opting for a light and airy look that will feel like summer all year round.

products.title: Coco, Autumn - Roman Blind
products.description: The coco in autumn blends smooth and silky texturing with soft autumnal colours for a beautifully three-dimensional feel. A creamy biscuit background is host to large, patterned leaves displaying fine stitching and in gorgeously golden mustard, bronze, and ivory tones, with hints of red thrown in for added depth. Use the autumn to display a classically cosy look in a living room or den, setting it amongst rich creams and golden browns in the form of walls, floors, and furniture.

products.title: Coco, Green - Roman Blind
products.description: Offering a natural yet contemporary look, the coco in green is the ideal choice for an understated look in a modern home. The palest of greens and a pretty stone grey sit on top of a green-hued oatmeal background, with the leaf illustrations only serving to accentuate this natural style. The green will work perfectly in a kitchen that gets plenty of natural light - but even if it doesn't, this blind's light tones will help to preserve what light you have.

products.title: Hollihocks, Navy - Roman Blind
products.description: The gorgeous shades of navy, teal, and pink in the stunningly country-style hollihocks navy stand out beautifully against the pale background and olive green accents. With it's linen-feel woven fabric, this roman blind is the perfect addition to a more rural setting. Pair the navy with country cream or palest blue walls in the kitchen or dining room for a fresh garden style. Use the vibrant colours of the fabric to choose accenting accessories in various shades, from placemats to utensils.

products.title: Oasis, Charcoal - Roman Blind
products.description: The oasis charcoal is a beautiful hybrid of abstract patterning and colourful foliage. Mauves and blues meet alongside rich charcoal, surrounded by a cool off-white tone. The blind has an ethereal quality that would look stunning in both contemporary or period homes. Make a feature of the charcoal by placing it against a wall in the palest of greys. Furnish the room in medium woods, dusky blues, and muted mauves, being sure to add in plenty of plush fabrics for extra comfort and style.

products.title: Nairobi, Pastel - Roman Blind
products.description: The pretty, unusual patterning of the nairobi in pastel displays a quirky style that art lovers will adore. Combining baby pinks with soft lilacs and pastel blues, adorned with attractive leopard imagery, the look is subtle yet effective. Surround the pastel with alike pastels, setting it against soft cream walls, and using the colours in the blind to accessorise throughout the room. Go for luxe, comfortable soft furnishings, making a room that you and your guests can really relax in.
